wikipedia_page.main: Nick Garrett is an English bass-baritone. He was a member of the vocal ensemble, The Swingle Singers, and the original bass-baritone in the opera band Amici Forever.

response: * Nick Garrett (bass-baritone) (born 1978), English songwriter, pianist, composer, and arranger
* Nick Garrett (TV character), fictional character on TV series October Road

*Poetry Serenade (English poems set by composer Brian Knowles) – Jon Christos (tenor), Nick Garrett (bass-baritone), Juliette Pochin (mezzo-soprano), Elin Manahan Thomas (soprano); City of Prague Philharmonic Orchestra, James Morgan (conductor). Label: Signum records.Steane, John, Review: Knowles: Poetry Serenade, Gramophone, March 2009, p. 82. Accessed 19 May 2010Signum Records, Liner notes: Poetry Serenade, 2008. Accessed 19 May 2010
The garden has been used several times to host operas. In 2009, 'The Marriage of Figaro' was performed by The Opera Project (including Nick Garrett in aid of the Kent Association for the Blind.
